nodes.text: Rodian Razor-Sticks were melee weapons used by Rodian bounty hunters. They were double-bladed, each blade forming an elongated "S". The handles were attached perpendicularly to the blades. Razor-Sticks were capable of causing extreme blood loss when used.
The Rodian Razor-Stick bears a resemblance to the ancient Indian dagger, the haladie.
